reviewText: I saw this when it was broadcast on PBS as a Bill Moyers special. It was compelling, mesmerizing, incredibly insightful, and moving beyond words. I have been trying to find a copy of this video for years. It is based on a symposium at Salado, Texas and participants included "everyday" people as well as famous people that had faced evil...either as it was imposed upon them or as they inflicted it upon others. After all these years (1980's), it is still vivid.
